Subject: Leaving so soon.....

Dreadwing flew up to the Dark Avian, before seperating into two 
seperate jets,Dreadwind and Darkwing, then both finally 
transforming into thier robot modes and landing on the ground in 
front of the Dark Avian.  (I have given you lots of notice Jer, that 
they were close, but everyone ignored them)  The two looked to the 
base, and seeing no autoguns sensed something wrong.  "See a 
doorbell anywhere Dreadwind" Darkwing said.

"Yes, I do as a matter of fact." Dreadwind replied as he pulled out 
his rifle.  Firing a shot at the door of the ship.  "Megatron. Time for 
you to come out, and meet your new leader.  We are giving you 
time to prepare the red carpets."

"Hah, good one Dread"

"Shut up Darkwing"
